name: Dondozo
flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

previous.name: Veluza
previous.flavorText: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.
